Sentencas: To support the current trend of testing bigger reversible Solid Oxide Cell (rSOC) modules, CEA has built the 120 kWDC Multistack platform.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a 4-stack solid oxide module in electrolysis mode

Sentencas: It was used to test SOLIDpower recently developed-Large Stack Module (LSM) in electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a 4-stack solid oxide module in electrolysis mode

Sentencas: Results show high thermal performance of the LSM, with homogeneous temperature distribution and losses in the kilowatt range above 700 degrees C. A performance map was recorded between 712 and 744 degrees C over 22.4-to-29.6 kg h-1 steam flowrates using a fast control strategy to avoid endothermic operation.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a 4-stack solid oxide module in electrolysis mode

Sentencas: A peak power of 74 kWDC was converted into more than 50 kg day-1 of H2 (35.5 kWhDC kgH2-1).
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a 4-stack solid oxide module in electrolysis mode

Sentencas: In addition, fuel utilization of more than 90% and steam conversion above 80% were demonstrated at the module level.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a 4-stack solid oxide module in electrolysis mode

Sentencas: In the end, the modular design of the LSM seems well suited for system scale up, paving the way for mutualization of auxiliaries and CAPEX reduction.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a 4-stack solid oxide module in electrolysis mode
